issue.title: Explicitly specify which Node versions are supported in the tutorial

content.raw: You're talking about [this tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=gzweb_install&cat=gzweb), right? Thanks for the note. The tutorial has an `Edit` button on the top. It would be great if you could open a pull request modifying the tutorial to mention the maximum supported version. Thanks!
content.html: You're talking about this tutorial, right? Thanks for the note. The tutorial has an Edit button on the top. It would be great if you could open a pull request modifying the tutorial to mention the maximum supported version. Thanks!
